answers.answer: People who get placed on bed rest are usually there because they over exert themselves, try to relax! Graduations, weddings, birthdays and of course baby coming is enough excitement for one month. Focus on you and the health of your baby and everything will come naturally. Sorry you have to be home alone for a while but it's only temporary, hope you feel better.
I'm on bedrest until baby comes and I'm only 33wks4days:/

Thanks babyhalestorm. My mom has been telling me I have been over doing it for a while now. Guess it just caught up with me. Hopefully it is only a week. Ashlynbrook93 wow that stinks. Good luck. I am 34 weeks. 35 weeks on sunday.but Hoping this week off helps. I guess I will be finding a new book to read and get back to crocheting

I have preeclampsia and hypertension so I know it's best for my little one just very boring. Resting does do wonders tho! I was working a couple weeks ago and my body felt much better after a week off:)

I've been on modified bed rest since 29 weeks. I'm at 34 now. I'm just taking this time to rest before life gets really crazy with a baby. I've been super blessed by friends and my husband taking care of me!
Well so far the week of rest has helped. My various viens have decreased in size and swelling. The clots seems to be breaking u p so that is great news. Kinda amazing what rest will do for you body.

question: I just wanna cry. I know some of you have been on it for a while. I just got put on it for a week then we will reevaluate... I have had very bad varicose  veins and they have become  extremely  painful that I can stand. Work is so busy with graduation and weddings I feel aweful!!! Busy weekend coming up. How do you ladies cope
title: bed rest  :(
